mapper.select: SELECT c.title, c.content, c.score, c.post_num, p.thumbnail, p.title AS posttitle, m.nickname FROM comment AS c, post AS p, member AS m WHERE c.member_num = #{num} AND c.post_num = p.post_num AND m.num = p.post_num
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO comment(post_num, title, content, score, member_num, created_date) VALUES(#{post_num}, #{title}, #{content}, #{score}, #{member_num}, NOW())
mapper.select: SELECT R1.* FROM( SELECT c.num, c.post_num, c.title, c.content, c.score, m.nickname AS member_num, c.created_date, c.updated_date FROM comment AS c, member AS m WHERE post_num = #{post_num} AND c.member_num = m.num ) R1 ORDER BY num DESC LIMIT #{no} , #{pageComment}

SELECT c.num, c.post_num, c.title, c.content, c.score, m.nickname AS member_num, c.created_date, c.updated_date FROM comment AS c, member AS m WHERE post_num = #{post_num} AND c.member_num = m.num AND score > 3 LIMIT 1

SELECT c.num, c.post_num, c.title, c.content, c.score, m.nickname AS member_num, c.created_date, c.updated_date FROM comment AS c, member AS m WHERE post_num = #{post_num} AND c.member_num = m.num AND score < 3 LIMIT 1
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO comment(post_num, title, content, score, member_num, created_date) VALUES(#{post_num}, #{title}, #{content}, #{score}, #{member_num}, NOW());
